title: What programs does the culinary academy offer?
description: We offer a range of programs including Culinary Arts, Baking and Pastry Arts, Hospitality Management, and specialized short courses like International Cuisine, Artisan Bread Baking, and Wine and Beverage Studies.

title: What are the admission requirements?
description: Admission requirements vary by program but generally include a high school diploma or equivalent, a completed application form, and an entrance interview. Some programs may require prior culinary experience or coursework.

title: How long do the programs take to complete?
description: Program lengths vary. Certificate programs can take 3-6 months, diploma programs typically last 1 year, and associate degree programs can take up to 2 years.Some courses may take 3 hours

title: Do you offer online courses?
description: Yes, we offer a selection of online courses for those who cannot attend in person. These include foundational culinary skills, food safety, and nutrition.

title: Is financial aid available?
description: Yes, we offer a variety of financial aid options including scholarships, grants, and payment plans. Please contact our financial aid office for more details.

title: Where is the academy located?
description: Our main campus is located in Dhaka,Bangladesh. We also have satellite campuses in Chattogram & Berlin.

title: What facilities are available to students?
description: Our campuses are equipped with state-of-the-art kitchens, baking labs, a student-run restaurant, a library, and computer labs. Students also have access to career services and counseling.

title: Is housing available for students?
description: Yes, we offer on-campus housing and can assist with finding off-campus accommodations. Housing availability may vary, so we encourage students to apply early.

title: What are the class sizes like?
description: We maintain small class sizes to ensure personalized instruction and hands-on learning. Typical class sizes range from 12-20 students.

title: What career support do you offer?
description: We offer extensive career services including resume writing workshops, interview preparation, job placement assistance, and networking events with industry professionals.

title: Do you have partnerships with local businesses for internships?
description: Yes, we have established partnerships with numerous local restaurants, hotels, bakeries, and catering companies to provide our students with valuable internship opportunities.

title: Are there extracurricular activities for students?
description: Yes, students can participate in various clubs and organizations such as the Culinary Club, Baking Society, Wine and Spirits Club, and community service initiatives.

title: Do you offer student support services?
description: We offer a range of support services including academic advising, tutoring, counseling, and wellness programs to ensure student success and well-being.

title: How can I apply?
description: You can apply online through our website or request a paper application by contacting our admissions office. Be sure to submit all required documents and fees by the application deadline.

title: Do you accept international students?
description: Yes, we welcome international students. We offer assistance with visa applications and provide support to help international students acclimate to life in [Country].

title: Are classes taught in English?
description: Yes, all classes are conducted in English. We require proof of English proficiency for non-native speakers, such as TOEFL or IELTS scores.

title: How can I get more information?
description: For more information, please visit our website at https://gastronomixx.netlify.app or contact our admissions office at support@gastronomix.com.
